actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, S. Rept. 95-455.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #550 (66-1).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, in lieu of H.R. 8390.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-777.

official_title: An Act to authorize appropriations during fiscal year 1978, in addition to amounts previously authorized, for procurement of aircraft and missiles for the Navy and the Air Force and for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force and the Defense agencies, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriations Authorization Act

summary.text: (Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 95-777) Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act - =Title I: Procurement= - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978 for the procurement of aircraft and missiles by the Navy and the Air Force. =Title II: Research, Development, Test and Evaluation= - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978 for research, development, test, and evaluation by the Air Force and the Defense agencies. Asserts the readiness of the Congress to consider such modifications in the U.S. cruise missile programs as the President may recommend to facilitate arms limitation negotiations.

titles.title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriations Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1978 for procurement of aircraft and missiles, and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces.

An Act to authorize appropriations during fiscal year 1978, in addition to amounts previously authorized, for procurement of aircraft and missiles for the Navy and the Air Force and for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force and the Defense agencies, and for other purposes.
